description:
In-Home Sales - We are Looking for Interior & Exterior consultants Baths, Showers, Windows, Siding, Doors - Offices in Tulsa & Oklahoma City
Cross training available for both interior & Exterior.

Are you a self-motivated go getter? Do you thrive in a fast paced, results driven environment? Tired of not getting paid more for being successful at your job?

If you answered yes, then we are looking for you!

Tailored Remodeling is a remodeling company that is a leader in the industry. We offer design assistance to help homeowners select the right combination of products that will enhance their home’s beauty for the interior and exterior of the home, reduce energy costs, and increase their home’s value. We are searching for driven, outgoing, design orientated Sales Consultants for our OKlahoma sales teams.

Experience within in-home sales is not necessary, full training and guidance/support is provided. If you are outgoing, willing to learn and have the drive to be successful. Then we are the company for you, with great opportunities to be successful with high earning potential!

We have our offices in Wichita, Kansas & Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. However, we cover the full area of Kansas and Oklahoma, and we are looking for Sales Consultants local and in any of these outside areas in OK or KS.

Sales Consultants Role and Responsibilities.

· In-home consultations for our residential customers.

· Assist homeowners with their current issues and help identify the best. solutions/products that best fits their needs.

· Deliver a proven sales presentation.

· Use product samples in the home to share with the customer our industry leading products.

· Attend professional paid training and weekly sales meetings.

· No Cold Calling! All leads are warm, and all appointments are pre-set and pre-qualified for you.

· Sales experience is a plus. However, don’t worry if you have never been in the home improvement industry. Our training program will teach you all you need to know!

Compensation For Sales Consultants.

· Commission Bonus.

· Competitive Pay: Earning Potential of $125k (the sky is the limit)

· Paid Training Program.

All Sales Consultants will be W-2 employees that qualify for the following benefits after 60 days of employment.

· Health, Dental and Vision insurance.

Tailored Remodeling is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to the individual's race, color, sex, national origin, religion, age, disability, genetic information, status as a military veteran, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $75,000.00 - $400,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• Dental insurance
• Health insurance

Supplemental pay types:
• Bonus pay
• Commission pay

License/Certification:
• Driver's License (Required)

Work Location: On the road
